var setMinHeight=function setMinHeight(){var header=document.getElementById("customHeader");var main=document.getElementById("main");main.style.minHeight=window.innerHeight-header.offsetHeight+"px";};window.addEventListener("resize",function(){setMinHeight();});useEffect(function(){setMinHeight();});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Router,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{id:"customHeader",className:"custom-header"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{className:"main",id:"main",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Suspense,{fallback:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Component Loading"}),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Switch,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PublicRoute,{path:"/login",component:Login,exact:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Private,{path:"/users",component:Users,exact:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Private,{path:"/users/:id",component:UserProfile,exact:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Private,{path:"/users/:id/posts",component:Posts,exact:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PublicRoute,{path:"/",component:Home,exact:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PublicRoute,{path:"*",component:Page404})]})})})]});}
